sentences.en: All autonomous regions , autonomous prefectures and autonomous counties are national autonomous areas.
sentences.cn: 自治区、自治州、自治县都是民族自治地方.

sentences.en: Although officially a dependent territory the island is effectively autonomous.
sentences.cn: 虽然正式说来这个岛是附属领土,但实际上是自治的.

sentences.en: Autonomous prefectures are divided into counties, autonomous counties, and cities.
sentences.cn: 自治州分为县 、 自治县 、 市.

sentences.en: Broadcasting, television , cinema, books, newspapers and magazines in autonomous areas use one or several local languages.
sentences.cn: 民族自治地方的广播 、 影视 、 图书 、 报纸、杂志,也都使用当地通用的一种或几种语言文字.

sentences.en: He treated us as autonomous individuals who had to learn to make up our own minds about important issues.
sentences.cn: 他把我们当作独立自主的个体来看待，认为我们必须学会在重大问题面前自己拿主意。

sentences.en: He treated us as autonomous individuals who had to learn to make up our own minds about issues.
sentences.cn: 他视我们为独立个体，必须学会自主处理问题。

sentences.en: Organs of self - government are established in autonomous regions , autonomous prefectures and autonomous counties.
sentences.cn: 自治区、自治州、自治县设立 自治机关.

sentences.en: Some economic analyses distinguish between autonomous and induced inventions.
sentences.cn: 有些经济分析区别自发的发明和诱发的发明.

sentences.en: The Autonomous Region has built up its infrastructure from scratch.
sentences.cn: 基础设施从无到有,不断发展壮大.

sentences.en: The contracts were to be long - term and would apply to autonomous work teams.
sentences.cn: 合同是 长期 的,并适用于自治的工作队.

sentences.en: The Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region controlled the spread of the plague in 1963.
sentences.cn: 宁夏于1963年控制了人间鼠疫.

sentences.en: The university has remained defiantly autonomous.
sentences.cn: 该大学一直尽力维护它的自治权.

sentences.en: Theoretically the corporative bodies should be autonomous.
sentences.cn: 理论上这些法人团体应该是独立自主的.

sentences.en: They proudly declared themselves part of a new autonomous province.
sentences.cn: 他们自豪地宣布成为新自治省的一部分。

sentences.en: This is a matter that comes within the jurisdiction of the autonomous region.
sentences.cn: 这件事是属于自治区权限以内的事务.

sentences.en: This of course was not an autonomous development of forest science.
sentences.cn: 这当然不是林业学的一种自主的发展.

words.tran_cn: 自治的,独立存在的,自发的

trans.tran_cn: 自治的，独立自主的，有主见的
trans.tran_en: an autonomous place or organization is free to govern or control itself
